name: Soft Plastic Worm
description: A versatile bait that mimics wounded prey, excellent for slow presentations and subtle manipulation.
purpose: Used to entice hesitant or pressured fish, especially Largemouth Bass.
pros: Excellent in calm or clear water
cons: Slow presentation may miss aggressive fish
Can be overused in pressured areas
techniques: Use Texas or Carolina rig depending on depth
Drag or twitch along bottom near cover
Pause frequently to simulate injured prey
whisper: The worm speaks through stillness. Yield to the rhythm of hesitation — and let curiosity be your hook.
